subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The blood test results for Boom, a member of the Astana cycling team, showed a low level of cortisol, which could indicate cortisone doping but is not conclusive proof.
snippet: The blood test results for Boom, a member of the Astana cycling team, showed a low level of cortisol, which could indicate cortisone doping but is not conclusive proof.
